search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for PrintNode (PrintNode.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for PrintNode is: [https://www.printnode.com/en/pricing](https://www.printnode.com/en/pricing) 【3:0†source】

citations.title: Plans for All Use Cases | PrintNode

extracted_content.content:
Plans for All Use Cases | PrintNode
===============                     

[](https://www.printnode.com/en/pricing#) [](https://www.printnode.com/en)

*   [DOWNLOAD](https://www.printnode.com/en/download)
*   [PRICING](https://www.printnode.com/en/pricing)
*   [FAQ](https://www.printnode.com/en/faq)
*   [DOCUMENTATION](https://www.printnode.com/en/docs)
*   [API](https://www.printnode.com/en/docs/api/curl)
*   [CONTACT](https://www.printnode.com/en/contact)
*   [STATUS](https://www.printnode.com/en/status)

*   [SIGN UP](https://app.printnode.com/login/register)
*   [LOGIN](https://app.printnode.com/login)

Plans for All Use Cases
=======================

Whether you print a handful of documents per month, or you run hundreds of locations performing millions of prints per day, we have a plan designed for your use case. Pick a box and click to see available plans.

Your First Month is Free!
-------------------------

When you sign up for a new account, you get a month of free, unlimited usage, so you have time to thoroughly test out the service and explore all the great features.

When you upgrade to an Integrator Account, we give you another month of free usage, to give you time to check out the extra capabilities of an Integrator Account and get started on your integration.

![Image 4](https://www.printnode.com/ui/images/single-account.png)

Single Account
==============

This is the best starter pack for individuals and businesses that want hassle-free, ultra-fast cloud printing. No need to worry about complex remote printing setups, just install our Client software and start printing!

![Image 5](https://www.printnode.com/ui/images/integrator-account.png)

Integrator Account
==================

With an Integrator Account, you can create and control new accounts. With our low pricing, you can provide PrintNode services to your customers as a free or cost-effective add-on. You can create as many accounts as you wish.

![Image 6](https://www.printnode.com/ui/images/standalone-install.png)

Standalone Server
=================

If you want to keep the server infrastructure in-house, for example to comply with corporate IT policy or HIPAA, we can provide our server software and support your private deployment. Get in touch to discuss the right pricing and licence options.

USD EUR GBP

Lite

No cost

Included in Plan

50 prints per month

?

**What counts as a print?**

One print request to the API. It doesn't matter how many pages are in the document.

**What if I exceed the included number of prints?**

Your prints will keep working, there will just be a top-up fee added to your invoice.

1 computer

?

**What counts as a computer?**

Any device which is running the PrintNode Client and is connected to our system. Typically you need one computer per location in which you want to print. It doesn't matter how many printers are connected to the computer.

**What can the PrintNode Client run on?**

Any computer which can run Windows, macOS or Linux, including low-power devices such as a Raspberry Pi. Mobile devices such as phones and tablets are not currently supported.

Additional Information

No charge, no invoices, no need to enter card details

[GET STARTED](https://app.printnode.com/login/register)

Essential

9 USD

per month

Included in Plan

Any computer which can run Windows, macOS or Linux, including low-power devices such as a Raspberry Pi. Mobile devices such as phones and tablets are not currently supported.

Additional Information

20 sub-accounts

?

**What is a sub-account?**

An Integrator Account lets you create sub-accounts for use by your end users. They all have separate credentials and have no visibility of your billing information or of each other. You would usually create one sub-account for each of your customers to whom you wish to provide printing services. We will only charge you for sub-accounts which are actually in use.

**What if I exceed the included number of accounts?**

This is no problem, there will simply be a top-up fee added to your invoice.

Unlimited computers

Any computer which can run Windows, macOS or Linux, including low-power devices such as a Raspberry Pi. Mobile devices such as phones and tablets are not currently supported.

Any computer which can run Windows, macOS or Linux, including low-power devices such as a Raspberry Pi. Mobile devices such as phones and tablets are not currently supported.

Additional Information

£1.75 per extra account

£0.35 per extra 1000 prints

[GET STARTED](https://app.printnode.com/login/register)

Contact us
----------

Please [get in touch](mailto:support@printnode.com) to get started with your private PrintNode deployment.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: PrintNode offers a variety of plans tailored to different usage needs, including free and paid tiers with monthly and annual billing options.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Starter pack for individuals and small businesses.
For businesses with higher printing requirements.

additional_fees.fee_description: Additional prints beyond the plan limit are charged based on the tier.
Each additional sub-account beyond the plan limit.
